items.title: The Gray Man
items.plot: When the CIA's most skilled operative-whose true identity is known to none-accidentally uncovers dark agency secrets, a psychopathic former colleague puts a bounty on his head, setting off a global manhunt by international assassins.
items.stars: Ryan Gosling, Chris Evans, Ana de Armas, Billy Bob Thornton

items.title: Thor: Love and Thunder
items.plot: Thor enlists the help of Valkyrie, Korg and ex-girlfriend Jane Foster to fight Gorr the God Butcher, who intends to make the gods extinct.
items.stars: Chris Hemsworth, Natalie Portman, Christian Bale, Tessa Thompson

items.title: Nope
items.plot: The residents of a lonely gulch in inland California bear witness to an uncanny and chilling discovery.
items.stars: Daniel Kaluuya, Keke Palmer, Brandon Perea, Michael Wincott

items.title: The Black Phone
items.plot: After being abducted by a child killer and locked in a soundproof basement, a 13-year-old boy starts receiving calls on a disconnected phone from the killer's previous victims.
items.stars: Mason Thames, Madeleine McGraw, Ethan Hawke, Jeremy Davies

items.title: Where the Crawdads Sing
items.plot: A woman who raised herself in the marshes of the deep South becomes a suspect in the murder of a man she was once involved with.
items.stars: Daisy Edgar-Jones, Taylor John Smith, Harris Dickinson, David Strathairn

items.title: Top Gun: Maverick
items.plot: After more than thirty years of service as one of the Navy's top aviators, Pete Mitchell is where he belongs, pushing the envelope as a courageous test pilot and dodging the advancement in rank that would ground him.
items.stars: Tom Cruise, Jennifer Connelly, Miles Teller, Val Kilmer

items.title: Elvis
items.plot: Elvis is Baz Luhrmann's biopic of Elvis Presley, from his childhood to becoming a rock and movie star in the 1950s while maintaining a complex relationship with his manager, Colonel Tom Parker.
items.stars: Tom Hanks, Austin Butler, Olivia DeJonge, Helen Thomson

items.title: Jurassic World Dominion
items.plot: Four years after the destruction of Isla Nublar, dinosaurs now live--and hunt--alongside humans all over the world. This fragile balance will reshape the future and determine, once and for all, whether human beings are to remain the apex predators on a planet they now share with history's most fearsome creatures in a new Era.
items.stars: Chris Pratt, Bryce Dallas Howard, Laura Dern, Sam Neill

items.title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
items.plot: An aging Chinese immigrant is swept up in an insane adventure, where she alone can save the world by exploring other universes connecting with the lives she could have led.
items.stars: Michelle Yeoh, Stephanie Hsu, Ke Huy Quan, James Hong

items.title: Minions: The Rise of Gru
items.plot: The untold story of one twelve-year-old's dream to become the world's greatest supervillain.
items.directors: Kyle Balda, Brad Ableson, Jonathan del Val
items.stars: Steve Carell, Pierre Coffin, Alan Arkin, Taraji P. Henson

items.title: Sing 2
items.plot: Buster Moon and his friends must persuade reclusive rock star Clay Calloway to join them for the opening of a new show.
items.stars: Matthew McConaughey, Reese Witherspoon, Scarlett Johansson, Tori Kelly

items.title: Paws of Fury: The Legend of Hank
items.fullTitle: Paws of Fury: The Legend of Hank (2022)
items.plot: Hank, a loveable dog with a head full of dreams about becoming a samurai, sets off in search of his destiny.
items.directors: Chris Bailey, Mark Koetsier, Rob Minkoff
items.stars: Michael Cera, Samuel L. Jackson, Ricky Gervais, Kylie Kuioka

items.title: Shamshera
items.plot: In the fictitious city of Kaza, a warrior tribe is imprisoned, enslaved and tortured by a ruthless authoritarian Shudh Singh. Shamshera is a legend for his tribe who relentlessly fights for his tribe's freedom and dignity.
items.stars: Ranbir Kapoor, Sanjay Dutt, Vaani Kapoor, Saurabh Shukla

items.title: Mrs Harris Goes to Paris
items.plot: A widowed cleaning lady in 1950s London falls madly in love with a couture Dior dress, and decides that she must have one of her own.
items.stars: Lesley Manville, Jason Isaacs, Alba Baptista, Rose Williams

items.title: Marcel the Shell with Shoes On
items.fullTitle: Marcel the Shell with Shoes On (2021)
items.plot: Feature adaptation of the animated short film interviewing a mollusk named Marcel.
items.stars: Jenny Slate, Dean Fleischer-Camp, Isabella Rossellini, Joe Gabler

items.title: Minions
items.plot: Minions Stuart, Kevin, and Bob are recruited by Scarlet Overkill, a supervillain who, alongside her inventor husband Herb, hatches a plot to take over the world.
items.stars: Sandra Bullock, Jon Hamm, Michael Keaton, Pierre Coffin

items.title: Mr. Malcolm's List
items.plot: A young woman courts a mysterious wealthy suitor in 19th century England.
items.stars: Freida Pinto, Sope Dirisu, Oliver Jackson-Cohen, Ashley Park

items.title: Despicable Me
items.plot: When a criminal mastermind uses a trio of orphan girls as pawns for a grand scheme, he finds their love is profoundly changing him for the better.
items.stars: Steve Carell, Jason Segel, Russell Brand, Julie Andrews

items.title: Gone in the Night
items.plot: When Kath and her boyfriend arrive at a remote cabin in the redwoods, they find a mysterious younger couple already there. Her boyfriend disappears with the young woman, and Kath becomes obsessed with finding an explanation.
items.stars: Winona Ryder, Sedrick Cabrera, John Gallagher Jr., Chesi Ho

items.title: Kung Fu Panda
items.plot: To everyone's surprise, including his own, Po, an overweight, clumsy panda, is chosen as protector of the Valley of Peace. His suitability will soon be tested as the valley's arch-enemy is on his way.
items.stars: Jack Black, Ian McShane, Angelina Jolie, Dustin Hoffman

items.title: Fire of Love
items.plot: Intrepid scientists and lovers Katia and Maurice Krafft died in a volcanic explosion doing the very thing that brought them together: unraveling the mysteries of volcanoes by capturing the most explosive imagery ever recorded.
items.stars: Miranda July, Katia Krafft, Maurice Krafft

items.title: The Killer
items.plot: A retired hitman agrees to take care of a teenaged girl, but when she becomes involved with unsavory people, he has to rescue her.
items.stars: Jang Hyuk, Seo-young Lee, Bang Eun-Jung

items.title: The Secret Life of Pets
items.plot: The quiet life of a terrier named Max is upended when his owner takes in Duke, a stray whom Max instantly dislikes.
items.stars: Louis C.K., Eric Stonestreet, Kevin Hart, Lake Bell

items.title: Fire
items.plot: A love triangle story about a woman caught between two men, her long-time partner and his best friend, her former lover.
items.stars: Juliette Binoche, Vincent Lindon, Grégoire Colin, Bulle Ogier

items.title: Trolls 2: World Tour
items.plot: When the Queen of the Hard Rock Trolls tries to take over all the Troll kingdoms, Queen Poppy and her friends try different ways to save all the Trolls.
items.stars: Anna Kendrick, Justin Timberlake, Rachel Bloom, James Corden

items.title: Malayankunju
items.plot: Anikkuttan is an ill-tempered electronics technician who leads a quiet life with his mother. His daily routines are disrupted when his next door neighbor's newborn baby stirs up undesirable memories from his past.
items.stars: Fahadh Faasil, Rajisha Vijayan, Arjun Asokan, Indrans

items.title: Thank You
items.plot: After a dramatic event happens, a successful man reviews the impactful moments in his life.
items.stars: Raashi Khanna, Naga Chaitanya Akkineni, Sai Sushanth Reddy, Aayush Agarwal

items.title: Gabby Giffords Won't Back Down
items.plot: Looking at the former congresswoman's courage and perseverance in the aftermath of the 2011 assassination attempt that left her partially paralyzed and with a language impairment, aphasia.
items.stars: Gabrielle Giffords, Mark Kelly

items.title: Hallelujah: Leonard Cohen, a Journey, a Song
items.fullTitle: Hallelujah: Leonard Cohen, a Journey, a Song (2021)
items.plot: This feature-length documentary explores the life of singer-songwriter Leonard Cohen as seen through the prism of his internationally renowned hymn, Hallelujah.
items.stars: Leonard Cohen, Nancy Bacal, Steve Berkowitz, Jeff Buckley

items.title: Chilli Laugh Story
items.plot: Work-from-home has led to a daily cage match with Coba's family. When he inadvertently learns his mother's homemade chili sauce is a hit with his co-workers, he convinces his family to turn the chili sauce into online business.
items.stars: Ronald Cheng, Gigi Leung, Edan Cheuk-On Lui, Sandra Kwan Yue Ng

items.title: Their Uncle
items.plot: Sultan is a boxer and trainer who works with his friend Saeed in a sports center. They find themselves in trouble when they stumble upon a printing press for counterfeit money.
items.stars: Mohamed Emam, Mohamed Sallam, Huda El Mufti, Mohamed Anwar

items.title: One Piece Film: Gold
items.plot: The Straw Hat Pirates come to Gran Tesoro, the richest ship in the world.
items.stars: Mayumi Tanaka, Kazuya Nakai, Akemi Okamura, Kappei Yamaguchi

items.title: Mozart from Space
items.plot: The story of a boy and a mysterious alien creature with wonderful musical ability.
items.stars: Bo Huang, Zishan Rong, Tiantian Fan, Wei Fan

items.title: Dinosaurs of Antarctica
items.plot: Journey to the south polar landscapes of Antarctica hundreds of millions of years ago. Join Antarctic scientists on a quest to understand the ice continent's profound transformation, and predict the future as humans drive dramatic change.

items.title: Into America's Wild
items.plot: Step off the beaten path and connect to your inner trailblazer in this new adventure of the natural world. Starting at Oregon's stunning coast, explore the scenic byways, ancient homelands and many other wonderful natural scenarios.
items.stars: John Herrington, Ariel Tweto, Jennifer Pharr Davis, Emma Faye Rudkin

items.title: Baba Yaga
items.plot: A long time ago a splendid deer with golden antlers lived in the woods, always protecting the poor and weak and disdaining evil. In a little village nearby the woods widow Yevdokya lived ... See full summary
items.stars: Georgiy Millyar, Aleksei Smirnov, Raisa Ryazanova, Volodya Belov
